name: sarek_tumor_normal_matched
description: nf-core/sarek pipeline optimized for matched tumor-normal somatic variant calling. Detects SNVs/indels with Mutect2, Strelka2, FreeBayes; SVs with Manta, TIDDIT; CNVs with CNVkit, Control-FREEC; MSI with MSIsensor-pro; purity/ploidy with ASCAT.
content:
Matched Tumor-Normal Somatic Analysis

This specialized configuration of nf-core/sarek is optimized for comprehensive somatic variant calling using matched tumor-normal sample pairs.

Analysis Pipeline:

  • SNVs/indels: Mutect2, Strelka2, FreeBayes

  • Structural variants (SVs): Manta, TIDDIT

  • Copy number variants (CNVs): CNVkit, Control-FREEC

  • Microsatellite instability (MSI): MSIsensor-pro

  • Purity/Ploidy analysis: ASCAT

Key Features:

  • Gold standard for somatic variant discovery with matched normal filtering

  • Comprehensive analysis including MSI and tumor purity/ploidy

  • Superior germline filtering reduces false positive somatic calls

  • Full spectrum of variant types: SNVs, indels, SVs, and CNVs

  • Advanced tumor characterization with ASCAT analysis

Sample Requirements: Requires matched tumor-normal pairs in the input samplesheet.
